description: Krissy Lynn stars in this epic Gang Bang fantasy. She is fed up with her husband after he spurns her invitations to spice up their boring sex life. Feeling rejected, her interest is peeked by a commercial she sees on TV about a the "Fantasy Fulfillment Bureau"- a gang bang delivery service she can't wait to try out!!Her cuckolded husband will not take her for granted any more after multiple guys have there way with her at once right in front of his eyes. Bound and gagged, he is made to watch his wife get manhandled, ass fucked, face fucked and double penetrated right before his eyes.
title: A Woman Scorned- Krissy's Fantasy Gang Bang Revenge!!
